name: Chain Tactics
description:
Your village has been overrun, and all the villagers have been captured and taken to a distant DUNGEON for safekeeping. They're being kept in the DARK and held captive by ZOMBIES, who are doing a better job eating them than watching them. You being the town WIZARD, are doing your best to rescue them from the most strategic place of all, the SAFETY of your tower. Do you have what it takes to guide them?

Chain Tactics is a puzzle tactics game where you control all your units at once, many moves at a time. It is created for the ChainLetter Jam where I was nominated by the talented blabberf, and builds on his entry Oracle Chain. Go ahead and give his game a play when you get the chance!

You can follow me on twitter  @spf_Grey to keep up with development and see my other projects!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you. Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (if you want to!).
